Clip.EpisodeSummary: Rev Ruth Wright's First United Church welcomes all those who have bottomed out on their luck in Vancouver.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: High above the Gulf of St. Lawrence, one of the East Coast's hidden wonders lies below - the Magdalene Islands - offering some of the region's top beaches, grassy hillsides and spectacular cliff faces.

Clip.Title: L.A. FROCK STARS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Being L.A.'s "vintage fashion guru" means that Doris Raymond must maintain the best inventory in the city and she makes sure the whole town knows about her timeless pieces. See how she generates priceless word of mouth when international trendsetter Jason Campbell pays her a visit.

Clip.Title: L.A. FROCK STARS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Join the bidding war and discover what it takes to make it in the increasingly competitive world of vintage fashion. Follow Doris, along with her store manager Sarah and fashion consultant Kyle, as they fly to New York and prepare to bid at the highly competitive Augusta Auction - one of the few auction houses in America that specializes solely in vintage clothing, rare textiles, and costume jewelry. This shopping spree will put Doris and her team to the test.

Clip.Title: THE REAL STORY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Get the real story behind some of the silver screen's most iconic films and characters.

Clip.Title: THE ORIGINS OF OZ
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The story of Dorothy's adventures in Oz have been seen and read by millions. Now learn the true story of the man behind the curtain, author L. Frank Baum.

Clip.Title: MAGNIFICA ITALIA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: A journey above the Dolomites peaks following the routes marked by the first alpine mountaineers, between woods and valleys with their legends and challenges. Wild rivers, tremendous falls and quiet lakes mark a landscape full of castles and fortresses where history and art reign.

Clip.Title: MINDFIELD
Clip.Episode: The Sky is not the Limit Part 1
Clip.EpisodeSummary: What happens when a small group of hardworking sleep deprived and under funded university students take on some of the brightest engineering minds in North America at NASA's Space Elevator Games? Follow as they prepare for and compete at Edward's Airforce Base for NASA's top prize - $2 million dollars.

Clip.Title: GREEN PARADISE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover destinations around the world, where local economies protect natural resources and wildlife diversity.

Clip.Title: GREEN PARADISE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover destinations around the world, where local economies protect natural resources and wildlife diversity.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Sylvia Earle, Why I Do Science: Healy Hamilton and Nature Deficit Disorder
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Sylvia Earle has spent last five decades exploring and protecting the world's oceans. Why does she think we're running out of time? Healy Hamilton studies rare Amazon River Dolphins, tiny octopuses and endangered sea horses for a living. And, find out why we need nature and explore unique programs designed get children outdoors.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Perilous Diesel, Urban Forest 2.0, and Falcon Fascination
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Black soot generated by diesel engines is the most harmful kind of air pollution. How are communities combatting the influx of unhealthy emissions? And urban forests are going digital with online maps of every street tree in the city. And, a nesting pair of Peregrine Falcons has become an unlikely internet sensation.

Clip.Title: GENIUS IN AMERICA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: They are amplifying unheard voices to the masses, revealing something new about something old, and changing the way we look at other worlds, and ourselves. Meet the recipients of the 2013 Smithsonian Magazine American Ingenuity Awards and witness their achievements in the fields of science, technology, arts, social progress, education, and more. From a mixed media showcase that defies convention to a new data analysis of the original social networker Ben Franklin, these breakthroughs offer a glimpse into the world of tomorrow.

Clip.Title: GREEN PARADISE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover destinations around the world, where local economies protect natural resources and wildlife diversity.
